amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement or enforce section 120, 425, 426, or 427 pertaining to water riders in the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement or enforce section 120, 425, 426, or 427 pertaining to water riders in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A084) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 246 (Roll no. 468).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A084) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 246 (Roll no. 468).
